channel.title: Linn County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Linn County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: OR-242 East - McKenzie Pass
item.description: OR-242 East - McKenzie Pass - Elevation 5325 Feet. McKenzie Pass is closed during the winter months, and is also closed year round to long vehicles. The top of the pass is a lava field, with great views of the area volcanos.

item.title: US-20 West - Albany
item.description: US-20 West approaching Willamette River bridge in Albany. Continue straight over bridge for US-20 West to Corvallis and Newport.

item.title: US-20 West/OR-99E (Pacific Blvd. SE) at US-20/OR-99E Split
item.description: US-20 West/OR-99E (Pacific Blvd. SE) at US-20/OR-99E split. Merge right for US-20 West/City Center (Albany)/Corvallis.

item.title: US-20 West/OR-99E South (Pacific Blvd. SE) Approaching Split
item.description: US-20 West/OR-99E South (Pacific Blvd. SE) approaching US-20/OR-99E split. Use right lane for US-20 West/City Center (Albany)/Corvallis.

item.title: US-20 West/OR-99E South at Geary Blvd.
item.description: US-20 West/OR-99E South (Pacific Blvd. SE) at Geary Blvd. Continue south on Pacific Blvd. SE for OR-99E/Junction City. Approaching ramp for US-20 West to City Center (Albany) and Corvallis.

item.title: US-20 West at I-5 South
item.description: US-20 west at I-5 south. Use I-5 south for Eugene. Turn right for Airport Road and Fair/Expo. Continue straight for US-20 west.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching I-5 South
item.description: US-20 west approaching I-5 south to Eugene.

item.title: US-20 West at I-5 North
item.description: US-20 west at I-5 north to Salem and Portland.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching I-5
item.description: US-20 west approaching I-5 in Albany.

item.title: US-20 West (Carolina St.) at Main St.
item.description: US-20 West (Carolina St.) at Main St. in Lebanon. Turn left for US-20 East to City Center (Lebanon) and Sweet Home. Turn right for US-20 west to Corvallis (via OR-34) and Albany. OR-34 joins US-20 a few blocks north of here.

item.title: US-20 West - Park St./Carolina St. Jct. in Lebanon
item.description: Park St. north at Carolina St. junction in Lebanon. US-20 west turns left on Carolina St. Turn left to continue west on US-20 for Albany and Corvallis.

item.title: US-20 West - Use Right Lane For Albany and Corvallis
item.description: US-20 West - Use Right Lane for Albany and Corvallis.

item.title: US-20 West at OR-228 West
item.description: US-20 west at OR-228 west to Brownsville and Halsey.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching OR-228
item.description: US-20 west approaching OR-228 west to Brownsville and Halsey.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West at US-20/OR-126 Split
item.description: US-20/OR-126 West at US-20/OR-126 split. Use OR-126 west for Springfield and Eugene. Use US-20 west for Sweet Home and Albany.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West at Split
item.description: US-20/OR-126 West approaching US-20/OR-126 split. Use OR-126 for Clear Lake and McKenzie River.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West at OR-22
item.description: US-20/OR-126 west at OR-22. Continue straight for OR-22 West to Detroit and Salem. Merge left for US-20/OR-126 West to Albany and Eugene.

item.title: Diagram of US-20/OR-126/OR-22 Junction - US-20/OR-126 West
item.description: Map diagram of junction at US-20/OR-126/OR-22 junction on US-20/OR-126 West. Continue straight for OR-22 west to Salem; merge left to continue west on US-20/OR-126 West to Eugene.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West Approaching OR-22
item.description: US-20/OR-126 West approaching OR-22 on the west side of Santiam Pass. Continue on US-20/OR-126 West for Albany and Eugene.

item.title: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 West
item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. Use OR-22 west for Detroit and Salem; use US-20/OR-126 east for Sisters and Bend.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West at OR-22
item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. This is the western base of Santiam Pass.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 East Approaching OR-22
item.description: US-20/OR-126 East approaching OR-22 in Linn County. In background is a West Cascades Scenic Byway sign. Turn left on OR-22 to continue on West Cascades Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-20 East at OR-126
item.description: US-20 east at OR-126. Turn right for OR-126 west to Eugene and Springfield. Continue east on US-20/OR-126 for Sisters and Bend. OR-126 joins US-20 over Santiam Pass to Sisters.

item.title: US-20 East - West Cascades Scenic Byway
item.description: US-20 east approaching OR-126. Turn right on OR-126 and continue ahead on US-20/OR-126 for West Cascades Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-20 East Approaching OR-126
item.description: US-20 east approaching OR-126 to Clear Lake and Mckenzie River.

item.title: US-20 East at OR-228
item.description: US-20 east at OR-228 west to Brownsville and Halsey.

item.title: US-20 East Approaching OR-228
item.description: US-20 East approaching OR-228 in Sweet Home.

item.title: US-20 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-20 east to Sweet Home and Bend.

item.title: US-20 East - Lebanon
item.description: US-20 east shield in Lebanon.

item.title: End OR-34 East at US-20
item.description: End OR-34 east at US-20. Turn right for US-20 east to Sweet Home; left for US-20 west to Albany. Continue ahead for South and East Truck Route.

item.title: End OR-34 East at US-20
item.description: End OR-34 east at US-20 in Lebanon.

item.title: OR-34 East/(To) US-20 - 2nd St./Morgan St.
item.description: OR-34 East/(To) US-20 at 2nd St./Morgan St. in Lebanon. Turn right to continue east on OR-34, towards US-20.

item.title: OR-34 East/(To) US-20 - 2nd St. Lebanon
item.description: OR-34 East/(To) US-20 at 2nd St. Lebanon. Turn left to continue east on OR-34.

item.title: OR-34 East - Lebanon
item.description: OR-34 east shield in Lebanon.

item.title: OR-34 East - Lebanon Truck Route
item.description: OR-34 east at south and east truck route through Lebanon. Northbound truck traffic and all other traffic continue east on OR-34 towards Lebanon.

item.title: OR-34 East Approaching Lebanon Truck Route
item.description: OR-34 east approaching south and east truck route through Lebanon. Northbound truck traffic and all other traffic continue east on OR-34 towards Lebanon.

item.title: OR-34 East Shield
item.description: OR-34 East in Linn County.

item.title: OR-34 East - Truck Restrictions On US-20
item.description: OR-34 East - Truck Restrictions On US-20 warning, just east of the I-5 interchange. Trucks exceeding these restrictions on the affected portion of US-20 need to return to I-5. OR-34 reaches US-20 in Lebanon a few miles east of here.

item.title: OR-34 East at I-5 North
item.description: OR-34 east at I-5 north. Use I-5 north for Salem; continue east on OR-34 for Lebanon. Notice the Freeway Entrance sign here. This type of sign is not common in Oregon at freeway entrances.

item.title: OR-34 East Approaching I-5 North
item.description: OR-34 east approaching I-5 north. Use right lane for I-5 north to Salem.

item.title: OR-34 East at I-5 South
item.description: OR-34 east at I-5 south. Turn right for I-5 south to Eugene; continue over freeway for I-5 north to Salem.

item.title: OR-34 East Approaching I-5
item.description: OR-34 east approaching I-5. I-5 traffic use right lane.

item.title: OR-34 East Approaching I-5
item.description: OR-34 East approaching I-5.

item.title: OR-34 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-34 east to Lebanon.

item.title: OR-34 East at OR-99E
item.description: OR-34 east at OR-99E to Albany and Junction City.

item.title: OR-34 East - Tangent
item.description: Entering Tangent on OR-34 east.

item.title: OR-34 East Approaching OR-99E
item.description: OR-34 east approaching OR-99E/Junction City/Albany.

item.title: OR-34 East Approaching Oakville Road
item.description: OR-34 east approaching Oakville Road.

item.title: OR-34 East at Harrison Blvd.
item.description: OR-34 east at Harrison Blvd. Turn right to continue east on OR-34 towards I-5, Albany, and Lebanon. Turn left towards US-20/OR-99W, and Corvallis City Center.

item.title: OR-34 East Approaching Harrison Blvd
item.description: OR-34 east approaching Harrison Blvd. Turn left on Harrison Blvd. for US-20/OR-99W.

item.title: OR-99E South at Territorial St. (To I-5)
item.description: OR-99E South at Territorial St. in Harrisburg. Use Territorial St. for I-5.

item.title: OR-99E - Big Muddy Creek
item.description: OR-99E at Big Muddy Creek. The OR-99E shield here is not a typical Oregon state highway style, rather a plain white circle. There were a few shields along or OR-99E in southern Linn County that were not standard.

item.title: End OR-228 West at OR-99E
item.description: End OR-228 west at OR-99E in Halsey. Turn right for Tangent and Albany. Turn left for Harrisburg and Junction City.

item.title: I-5 South at OR-228
item.description: I-5 south at OR-228 junction. Turn right on OR-228 for Halsey and Junction City. Turn left on OR-228 for Brownsville and Linn County Historical Museum.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 216
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 216 - OR-228/Brownsville/Halsey.

item.title: OR-34 East at I-5 Onramp
item.description: OR-34 east at I-5 onramp. Turn right for I-5 south to Eugene; continue ahead for I-5 north to Salem.

item.title: I-5 South at OR-34
item.description: I-5 south at OR-34 junction. Turn right for OR-34 west to Linn-Benton (Community College), Corvallis, and Oregon State (University). Turn left for Lebanon.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 228
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 228 - OR-34/Lebanon/Corvallis.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 233
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 233 - US-20 East/Lebanon/Sweet Home.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 234A
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 234A - Knox Butte/Fair/Expo.

item.title: I-5 South - Exits 234BA
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 234B - OR-99E/Albany. Approaching Exit 234A - Knox Butte/Fair/Expo. For Foster Lake, use US-20/Santiam Highway, Exit 233.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 234B
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 234B - OR-99E/Albany.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 235
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 235 - Millersburg.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 237
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 237 - Viewcrest.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 238
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 238 - Scio/Millersburg.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 239
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 239 - Dever - Conner.

item.title: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 West
item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. This is the western base of Santiam Pass.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West at OR-22
item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. This is the western base of Santiam Pass.

item.title: OR-126 East at US-20 Near Santiam Pass
item.description: OR-126 at US-20 nearing Santiam Pass. OR-126 joins US-20 east over Santiam Pass to Sisters.

item.title: US-20 East - Hoodoo Ski Area
item.description: US-20/OR-126 east approaching Hoodoo Butte Ski Area/Big Lake Road/Benson Snow Park, 1/2 mile.

item.title: US-20 East - Santiam Pass/Jefferson County Line
item.description: US-20/OR-126 east at Santiam Pass, Jefferson-Linn County line.

item.title: US-20 East - On West Approach To Santiam Pass
item.description: Snow Zone overhead and electronic message board on US-20 East at Santiam Pass.
